SELECT D.site_name AS "category", ROUND(C.total_bill/E.class_cnt) AS "value" FROM ems.ismart_bas A INNER JOIN ems.school_bas E ON A.ismart_no = E.ismart_no INNER JOIN ems.total_info D ON A.ismart_no = D.cust_no LEFT JOIN ems.cyber_kepco_info B ON A.ismart_no = B.cust_no LEFT JOIN ems.cyber_kepco_cost C ON A.ismart_no = C.cust_no AND C.sel_cost = B.sel_cost WHERE B.end_month = #{tgtDate} AND B.end_month = C.end_month
AND A.ismart_no = null
AND A.ismart_no in
#{item.ismartId}
ORDER BY 2 desc

SELECT D.site_name AS "category", C.total_bill AS "columnValue", E.student_cnt AS "lineValue" FROM ems.ismart_bas A INNER JOIN ems.school_bas E ON A.ismart_no = E.ismart_no INNER JOIN ems.total_info D ON A.ismart_no = D.cust_no LEFT JOIN ems.cyber_kepco_info B ON A.ismart_no = B.cust_no LEFT JOIN ems.cyber_kepco_cost C ON A.ismart_no = C.cust_no AND C.sel_cost = B.sel_cost WHERE B.end_month = #{tgtDate} AND B.end_month = C.end_month
AND A.ismart_no = null
AND A.ismart_no in
#{item.ismartId}
ORDER BY 2 desc

SELECT B.site_name AS "category", C.boy_cnt * -1 AS "boyCnt", C.girl_cnt AS "girlCnt" FROM ems.ismart_bas AS A INNER JOIN ems.total_info AS B ON A.ismart_no = B.cust_no INNER JOIN ems.school_bas AS C ON A.ismart_no = C.ismart_no
WHERE A.ismart_no = null
WHERE A.ismart_no IN
#{item.ismartId}

SELECT D.site_name AS "category", C.total_bill AS "totalBill", E.scl_area AS "sclArea" FROM ems.ismart_bas A INNER JOIN ems.school_bas E ON A.ismart_no = E.ismart_no INNER JOIN ems.total_info D ON A.ismart_no = D.cust_no LEFT JOIN ems.cyber_kepco_info B ON A.ismart_no = B.cust_no LEFT JOIN ems.cyber_kepco_cost C ON A.ismart_no = C.cust_no AND C.sel_cost = B.sel_cost WHERE B.end_month = #{tgtDate} AND B.end_month = C.end_month
AND A.ismart_no = null
AND A.ismart_no in
